mission: We simplify HR and payroll administration, and empower you with useful information so that you can invest more in people.

Norway.msg_ooo_thanks: Thank you for your email.
Norway.msg_ooo_main_start:
I will review your email upon my return. In my absence, if you need urgent assistance, please:

  • Contact the Zalaris Norway office on +47 4000 3300.
  • Forward your email to my line manager -
Norway.msg_ooo_main_urgent: • If it is really urgent, please text , although I may have limited opportunity to respond.
Norway.tagline:

Germany.legal_info:
Die ZALARIS Deutschland AG ist im Mai 2018 aus der sumarum AG hervorgegangen. Sie gehört zur börsennotierten ZALARIS ASA aus Norwegen - mit rund 900 Mitarbeitern in 13 Ländern, davon allein 250 in Deutschland. Wir sind SAP Partner und Komplettdienstleister mit einem Leistungsspektrum von IT Lösungen und Prozessberatung für alle backoffice relevanten Bereiche mit Schwerpunkt auf HR und Accounting.

ZALARIS Deutschland AG HRB 8473 KI Amtsgericht Kiel USt.ID: DE 213923616 Aufsichtsratsvorsitzender: Hans-Petter Mellerud
Vorstandsvorsitzender: Harald Goetsch; Vorstand: Lutz Friedrich, Volker Müller, Frank Wortmann
Germany.tagline:
Follow us to
Simplify work life. Achieve more.

I will review your email upon my return. In my absence, if you need urgent assistance, please:

  • Contact the Zalaris UK&I office on +44 1932 213250.
  • Forward your email to my line manager -
UK&I.msg_ooo_main_urgent: • If it is really urgent, please text , although I may have limited opportunity to respond.
UK&I.legal_info: Zalaris UK&I (part of the Zalaris ASA group) is the operating name of Zalaris Consulting UK Limited which is a private limited company registered in England, number 03538201, with registered address 62 Wilson Street, London, England, EC2A 2BU. Please see our UK & Ireland Our Offices page for postal addresses. All e-mails, including any associated resources, are intended only for the addressee named above and may contain confidential or privileged information. Please read our full Email Disclaimer for more details.
UK&I.msg_support:
For all customer support requests please do one of the following

  • If this is a new support request please raise via the Zalaris UK&I Support Portal at http://zalaris.co.uk/help-desk, or forward to rocsupport@roc-group.com.
  • If this is an update to an existing support request then please update TOPdesk directly or reply to a TOPdesk e-mail for this request in the normal way.
  • If you have any problems accessing the Zalari UK&I Support Portal please contact Melissa Lake on 01932 213255 or by email at melisslake@zalaris.com.
UK&I.dialcode: +44 for the UK and +353 for Ireland
UK&I.tagline:
Follow us to
Simplify work life. Achieve more.

out.name: Out of the Office
out.none: I am currently out of the office.
out.single: I am currently out of the office and will be returning on $1.
out.range: I will be out of the office from $1 to $2.

vacation.name: On Leave
vacation.none: I am currently on annual leave.
vacation.single: I am currently on annual leave and will return to work on $1.
vacation.range: I am currently on annual leave from $1 to $2.

training.name: On a Training Course
training.none: I am currently on a training course.
training.single: I am currently on a training course and will return to work on $1.
training.range: I am on a training course between $1 and $2.

overseas.name: Working Overseas
overseas.none: I am currently working outside of the country with limited access to email.
overseas.single: I am currently working outside of the country with limited access to email and will return to work on $1.
overseas.range: I am currently working outside of the country with limited access to email from $1 to $2.

ill.name: Ill
ill.none: I am currently unwell and will return to work as soon as I am able.
ill.single: I am currently unwell and expect to return on $1.
ill.range: I am currently unwell and expect to be out of the office from $1 to $2.
